plot: Buddy is a owner of a circus; he must save a baby who fell from the seats and performs with the circus acts.
title: Buddy's Circus
plot_es: Buddy is a owner of a circus; he must save a baby who fell from the seats and performs with the circus acts.
plot_en: Buddy is a owner of a circus; he must save a baby who fell from the seats and performs with the circus acts.
